# vertices

**Instance Property**

An array of vertex positions for each point in the face mesh.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var vertices: [simd_float3] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each `float3` value in this array represents the position of a vertex in the mesh, in face coordinates. (See [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor#Tracking-Face-Position-and-Orientation].)

## Accessing Mesh Data

- **textureCoordinates**: An array of texture coordinate values for each point in the face mesh.
- **triangleCount**: The number of triangles described by the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceGeometry/triangleIndices-3tb1o] buffer.
- **triangleIndices**: An array of indices describing the triangle mesh formed by the face geometry’s vertex data.
